mRealActor.description: This is the real actor that this representation represents

mIsStatic.description: If the actor is static or can be moved

mRepresentationTexture.description: This is the texture to show for this actor representation

mRepresentationText.description: This is the text to show for this actor representation

mRepresentationColor.description: This is the color used for the representation of this actor

mRepresentationType.description: This helps define how this actor representation should be presented

mShouldShowInCompass.description: If this should be shown in the compass or not

mShouldShowOnMap.description: If this should be shown on the map or not

mCompassViewDistance.description: How far away this representation should be shown in the compass
